name: Midnight Survivors: Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195510/Midnight_Survivors/?beta=0

It's Time to Spit Out All Bullets!


Take control of the bullet-spitting cat and take down waves of enemies.


Upgrade your cat and get various weapons and skills to defeat your enemies.


Find a more efficient strategy by combining various skills.


Let your enemies know who will be the last one standing.
